caption.title: Table S1. Search strings used to find literature for our meta-analysis. Table S2. Variables extracted for meta-analysis Table S3. Citation list of the literature reviewed in our study Table S4. List of species investigated by our reviewed studies, including 196 amphibian and 118 reptilian species, including unidentified species (sp.). Table S5. Comparison of the number of species investigated by the reviewed studies (“Nr. spp. studied”) and the total number of known species in each region (“Spp. in region”). Table S6. Comparison of the total number of amphibian and reptilian species within families (Spp. Total) with the number of species per family investigated by the reviewed studies (Spp. Studied)
